title: Crime Alert 04.14.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.14.21
description:
Woman hits two pedestrians then runs. Preacher's wife tells police she wakes up next to her husband who has a bullet in his head.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
